    • informReferee

      public void informReferee(int team) throws RemoteException
      The coach waits for the contestants from his team to be ready. The last coach informs the referee that the team is ready. The coach waits for the trial to be decided by the referee.
      Specified by:

    • pullTheRope

      public int pullTheRope(int team, int contestant, int strength) throws RemoteException
      The contestant pulls the rope with a similar distance as his current strength. The contestant loses 1 unit of strength after pulling the rope.
      Specified by:
      pullTheRope in interface IPlayground_Contestant
      Parameters:
      team - the team
      contestant - the contestant
      strength - the current strength
      Returns:
      the updated strength
      Throws:
      RemoteException - a remote exception
